name: chapter_02_system_overview
prompt: Cinematic video chapter title card with text 'System Overview' written in large, bold, futuristic sans-serif font centered. Background is a sleek, modern tech abstract design with deep dark blue (#1a1a2e) and glowing accents in cyan (#00d4ff) and purple (#7b2cbf). High contrast, professional motion graphics style, 8k resolution, highly detailed, digital interface elements, subtle grid patterns, glassmorphism effects. Text must be clearly legible and the focal point.
